original_title: Rajitha Senaratne pledges support to President Ranil
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) Kalutara District MP Dr. Rajitha Senaratne has met President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the Gangarama Seema Malaka, a short while ago, and pledged his support for the upcoming presidential election.
